sentences.en: Be sure to remind her to come back early.
sentences.cn: 一定要提醒她早点回来.

sentences.en: Daytime television tended to remind her too forcefully of her own situation.
sentences.cn: 日间电视节目往往使她深刻地认识到自身的境况。

sentences.en: He made a few notes to remind himself of what he wanted to say.
sentences.cn: 他记了几条，提醒自己要说些什么。

sentences.en: I always remind myself that time and tide wait for no man.
sentences.cn: 我总是提醒自己岁月不待人.

sentences.en: I'm sorry, I've forgotten your name. Can you remind me?
sentences.cn: 对不起，我忘了你的名字。提醒我一下好吗？

sentences.en: I've forgotten his name — will you remind me of it?
sentences.cn: 我忘记了他的名字——请提醒我一下好 吗 ?

sentences.en: In case I forget, please remind me about it.
sentences.cn: 我要忘了就请提醒我一下.

sentences.en: Let me remind you once again so that you won't forget.
sentences.cn: 我再说一遍,省得你忘了.

sentences.en: Need I remind you who the enemy is?
sentences.cn: 还需要我来提醒你敌人是谁吗？

sentences.en: Please remind him that we are leaving at six tomorrow morning.
sentences.cn: 请提醒他我们明晨6时出发.

sentences.en: Remind me to buy another hairspray when I'm in town, would you?
sentences.cn: 在我进城时提醒我再买一罐喷发定型剂, 好 吗 ?

sentences.en: She resolved that, if Mimi forgot this promise, she would remind her.
sentences.cn: 她决定，如果米米忘记了这个承诺，她就提醒她。

sentences.en: Thanks for your gift — it will always remind me of you.
sentences.cn: 谢谢你们的礼物——它将使我经常想到你们.

sentences.en: The cliffs, lapped by a crystal-clear sea, remind her of Capri.
sentences.cn: 清澈的海水拍打着悬崖峭壁，令她想起了卡普里。

sentences.en: These notes will remind you how to present your ideas.
sentences.cn: 这些笔记可以帮你记起怎样讲清楚你的意思.

sentences.en: We must send a letter to remind them about it.
sentences.cn: 我们得去封信提醒他们这件事.

sentences.en: Yes, I’ll be there. Thanks for reminding me.
sentences.cn: 是的，我会去那里的。 谢谢提醒。

trans.tran_en: to make someone remember something that they must do
